name: OhoShop Pvt. Ltd.
description:
Ohoshop is an m-commerce SaaS platform where local businesses can build their personalized mobile app for Android and iOS devices without any coding skills.
It's a venture of Rightway solution launched in 2016 to bring local businesses mobile. Users can launch a mobile app for their store, upload their catalogs, customize their apps and sell their products to customers quickly.
We have 100+ happy clients in our portfolio.
